text_en: The first step when learning braille is to be aware that a letter consists of six points.
It is important to train the tactile senses  when the vision is reduced.
The next step is to create letters on a slate.
Perkins braillemachine is an important tool to master.
It's nice to have a peer in the classroom who can read aloud what is written on the blackboard.
Finally the child can be a part of an inclusive class!
